name: apple-festival-mern
description: Apple Harvest Festival - Full MERN Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm start
